original_text: If she does not return to me, I will remove all her clothes. She will have nothing to wear, like the day when she was born. She will be ashamed. Her life will be useless and empty, like a dry land that has no water. Then I will leave her to die because she has no water to drink.
korean_text: 그렇지 아니하면 내가 그를 벌거벗겨서 그 나던 날과 같게 할 것이요 그로 광야 같이 되게 하며 마른 땅 같이 되게 하여 목말라 죽게 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: If she does not return to me
I will remove all her clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그녀의 모든 옷을 벗길 것이다

sentences.original_text: She will have nothing to wear
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 입을 것이 아무것도 없을 것이다

sentences.original_text: like the day when she was born
Her life will be useless and empty
like a dry land that has no water
Then I will leave her to die
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 나는 그녀를 죽게 내버려 둘 것이다

sentences.original_text: because she has no water to drink
